channel.title: 718 Webclient Wont Work?
channel.description:
Hello everyone, Ive ran webclients in the past, never on a 718 though. & recently I decided to make a 718, I did, and I am now attempting to put it onto a webclient. I've .Jared it correctly, and I believe I've done every step correctly..
As I pull up my .html it continues to tell me that It can not find my Loader.class... Well Its nearly impossible for it not to find it, because i re-did my jar 4 times, to make sure I was jaring through bin. which then led to bin/Loader.class.
I've re-looked constantly to make sure it's there. & it is..... I'm not sure what else to do.. Anyone have any suggestions?
[URL=http://s286.photobucket.com/user/killacam3160/media/LOADER.png.html][IMG]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll86/killacam3160/LOADER.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: 718 Webclient Wont Work?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Hmm… On dropbox do you have a public folder because someone else had the same problem with there’s it said client.class & they didn’t have a public folder so I enabled one for them and uploaded the jar to the public folder and then it started to work!!

Read full topic

item.title: 718 Webclient Wont Work?
item.dc:creator: @jagex4lmo jagex4lmo
item.description:
@jagex4lmo wrote:

Hello everyone, Ive ran webclients in the past, never on a 718 though. & recently I decided to make a 718, I did, and I am now attempting to put it onto a webclient. I’ve .Jared it correctly, and I believe I’ve done every step correctly…

As I pull up my .html it continues to tell me that It can not find my Loader.class…
Well Its nearly impossible for it not to find it, because i re-did my jar 4 times, to make sure I was jaring through bin. which then led to bin/Loader.class.

I’ve re-looked constantly to make sure it’s there. & it is… I’m not sure what else to do… Anyone have any suggestions?

[URL=http://s286.photobucket.com/user/killacam3160/media/LOADER.png.html][/URL]

Read full topic
